DD1.comments: This section is restricted to students in the Bachelor  and  Master of Management Dual Degree program. Please note that BIE students taking COEC 293 are not required to take COMM 320.A waitlist section will become available when this course is full. Students registered in the waitlist, COMM 320 WL1, will be transferred into the regular module in order of their registration as seats become available.

WL1.comments: This is a waitlist section for COMM 320 DD1. Students registered in this waitlist will be transferred into the regular module, in order of their registration, as seats become available.

description: Preparation of financial statements and use of financial information contained in financial statements to make better decisions. For Master of Management - Dual Degree Option students only.
